name: SOLVD HEALTH
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: To promote awareness among policy makers of Prescient Medicines novel genetic testing technology designed to objectively assess an individuals risk of opioid addiction prior to opioid exposure.
